roles.name: Cloudigrade - Administrator
roles.description: A Cloudigrade administrator role that grants read and write permissions to everything.

roles.name: Cloudigrade Account - Administrator
roles.description: A Cloudigrade role that grants read and write permissions to cloud accounts.

roles.name: Cloudigrade Account - Read
roles.description: A Cloudigrade role that grants read permissions to cloud accounts.

roles.name: Cloudigrade Account - Write
roles.description: A Cloudigrade role that grants write permissions to cloud accounts.
